::Zardus/Panzertron/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer::

Reptilica and Bloodystrike flies up to the place where the Oblitercons had 
stopped, also stopping. Reptilica activates his comm-link.

"Zardus, the Maximals got away, what do you want us to do?" he asks into it.

"Go back and see if you can find the Predacons," Zardus replies, "Tell them 
the Alliance is willing to help to an extent."

Reptilica nods, motioning to Bloodystrike and flying off toward where his 
scanners reported Predacons to be, scanning the area as he and Bloodystrike 
fly through the air.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus stops in the air, seeing Panzertron below him. He deactivates his 
jetpack, dropping down behind Panzertron.

The big bot spins around, aiming its cannon at him. He relaxes when he sees 
that it was Zardus.

"You have a deathwish?" he says, "I could have shot you there."

Zardus nods. "What did you want to talk to me about?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer walks into the Alliance base, heading for the CR chambers.
